column2: "Na David sisii adan maa noho wɔ David kurow mu; na osiesiee bea bi maa Nyankopɔn n'adakaa no
column3: na ɔbɔɔ asese bi maa no."
Obiara nnyi ho kwan dɛ ɔsoa Nyankopɔn adakaa no gyedɛ Levifo no ara nko: osiandɛ hɔn na EWURADZE asan mu eyi hɔn dɛ wɔnsoa Nyankopɔn n'adakaa no

column2: "Na David poon Israel nyinara behyiaa Jerusalɛm
column3: dɛ wɔrekɛfa EWURADZE n'adakaa no aba ne sibew a oesiesie ama no no."
na no nuanom ɔha nye duebien."

column2: "Na David kɛfrɛɛ asɔfo Zadok na Abiathar
column12: Hom nye Levifo mu egyanom efiefi mu etsitsir: hom ntsew homho
column16: n'adakaa no aba ne sibew a mesiesie ama no no."

column2: "Na osiandɛ nkan no hom annsoa ntsi
column3: EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn bui faa hɛn do
column4: dɛ yɛannhwehwɛ no dɛ mbrɛ n'amambra no tse."

column2: "Nna asɔfo na Levifo no tseew hɔnho dɛ wɔrekɛfa EWURADZE
"Na Levifo mba no soaa Nyankopɔn n'adakaa no wɔ hɔn kɔn ho
column4: dɛ mbrɛ Moses nam EWURADZE n'asɛm no do hyɛe no."

column2: "Na David kaa kyerɛɛ Levifo safohen no dɛ wonyi hɔn nuanom no adwontofo a wɔdzedze asanku ndzɛmba
column3: bɛnta asanku na nsankutsen na nkasaa a wɔma ɔgyegye kɛse na wɔma ndze do enyigye mu."

column2: "Nna Levifo no yii Joel ne ba Heman; na no nuanom mu
column3: Berekia ne ba Asaf; na hɔn nuanom Merari ne mba no mu

column2: "na hɔn nuanom a wodzi hɔn ekyir no ka hɔn ho

column6: dɛ wɔmfa boran nkasaa nwosow ma wɔntse nka;"

column10: dɛ wɔmfa bɛnta asanku mbɔ no wɔ Alamot do;"

column4: ɔhwɛ ndwom no do: ɔno na ɔkyerɛkyerɛe wɔ ndwom no ho

column2: "Na Berekia na Elkana wɔyɛ adaka no mbobowano ahwɛfo."

column10: nna wɔhɛn mbɛn wɔ Nyankopɔn n'adakaa no enyim: na Obed-edom na Jehia nna wɔyɛ adaka no mbobowano ahwɛfo."

column4: na apem apem do asafohemfo no
column5: dze enyigye sii mu kɔr dɛ wɔrekɛfa EWURADZE n'ahyɛmudaka no efi Obed-edom fie aba:"

column3: aber a Nyankopɔn boaa Levifo a wɔso EWURADZE n'ahyɛmudaka no no
column4: wɔdze anantwisaa esuon na nguannyin esuon bɔɔ afɔr."

column3: na Levifo a wɔso adaka no nyinara
column5: na Kenania ndwom kyerɛkyerɛfo a ɔka adwontofo no ho no: nna ndwera asɔfontar gu David no ho."
nye nkasaa a ɔgyegye kɛse nye bɛnta asanku na nsankutsen

column3: aber a EWURADZE n'ahyɛmudaka no dur David kurow mu no
column4: Saul ne babaa Mikal hwɛɛ tokura mu
column5: na ohun ɔhen David dɛ ɔresaw na ɔrogor; na obuu no enyimtsia wɔ n'akoma mu."
